recipe.name: Pedernales River Chili
recipe.notes: The paper claims a lineage from Lady Bird Johnson and is allegedly verifiable on the LBJ online library (lbjlib.utexas.edu > research > reference > quick facts > recipes).Chili meat is defined for us here as "coursley gorund round steak or a well-rimmed chuck".According to the article, Lady Bird came up with this after LBJ had his first heart attack.  Surprisingly he continued to live through this much sodium.  Ole!
recipe.preparation: Brown meat and cook onion and garlic until translucent in a large heavy pan or Dutch Oven.  Add oregano, ground cumin, tomatoes, hot pepper sauce, salt and hot water  and bring mixture to a boil before simmering one hour.  Skim off fat during cooking.
recipe.source_name: Chester Progressive: Chase off the chill with simmering pots of chowder and chili
